1456670.name: Pixel Game Maker Series 兼职炮手 -吐槽佣兵的哀愁- Soundtrack
1456670.description:
This is the soundtrack to "Pixel Game Maker Series STEOS -Sorrow song of Bounty hunter-".
Contains all 12 songs used in the game.

[Recorded music]
01 Splash 125 Inc
02 Boot
03 Ready
04 Engage
05 Zero Octa
06 Debris of Idea
07 Aporia of the Seeds
08 Hephaestus’ Garden
09 the Eye of Anamnessis
10 Yes
11 AI discourse
12 Indomitable spirit
